医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
认识万达：人工智能生成的影响者传播癌症预防信息人工智能产生的影响者可以以低成本在社交媒体上有效传播癌症预防信息，为公共卫生活动提供可扩展的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Meet-Wanda-The-AI- generated-influencer-spreading-cancer-prevention-messages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Meet-Wanda-The-AI- generated-influencer-spreading-cancer-prevention-messages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e87f6fec-e042-4528-84c5-eb05c2911649 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 20:38:00 -0500 Meet Wanda: The AI-generated influencer spreading cancer prevention messages
自闭症跨性别者报告医疗保健体验较差剑桥大学自闭症研究中心的研究人员发现，与性别认同与出生时指定性别（顺性别）相符的自闭症患者和非自闭症患者相比，这些人的医疗质量也较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Autistic-transgender-people-report-poorer-healthcare-experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Autistic-transgender-people-report-poorer-healthcare-experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ae2cecc-af6d-4e7b-9b70-6b78cbdbebdd Mon, 20 Jan 2025 20:29:21 -0500 Autistic transgender people report poorer healthcare experiences
家长通过成人体重管理计划对儿童体重支持持开放态度布里斯托大学领导的一项新研究发现，参加成人体重管理项目的父母担心孩子的体重，如果有的话，他们会接受为孩子提供的支持和服务指示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Parents-open-to-child-weight-support-through-adult-weight-management-programs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Parents-open-to-child-weight-support-through-adult-weight-management-programs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a6798ef-42d4-421e-af95-135879ad85a4 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 20:24:00 -0500 Parents open to child weight support through adult weight management programs
自动化技术简化了用于癌症治疗的砹 211 生产Astatine-211 (At-211) 是少数有前景的用于癌症治疗的 α 发射放射性同位素之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Automated-technology-streamlines-astatine-211-production-for-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Automated-technology-streamlines-astatine-211-production-for-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c519f1cb-1bda-45ae-98a1-cf97892c47d6 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 19:44:37 -0500 Automated technology streamlines astatine-211 production for cancer therapy
专家共识为中国前列腺癌​​治疗提供统一框架尽管前列腺癌在中国中老年男性中越来越流行，但由于在患者护理的多个方面缺乏统一的指南和高水平的证据，临床实践仍然面临相当大的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Expert-consensus-provides-unified-framework-for-prostate-cancer-care-in-China.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Expert-consensus-provides-unified-framework-for-prostate-cancer-care-in-China.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e652857-93b4-4534-9a50-f2e95064a442 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 19:37:26 -0500 Expert consensus provides unified framework for prostate cancer care in China
探索基因组分类器测试在前列腺癌风险分层中的应用一项系统评价发现，虽然基因组分类器 (GC) 测试可能会影响局限性前列腺癌 (PCa) 患者的风险分类或治疗决策，但仍需要更好的数据来了解其成本效益、临床效用及其对种族的影响和种族群体，特别是黑人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Exploring-the-use-of-genomic-classifier-tests-in-prostate-cancer-risk-stratification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Exploring-the-use-of-genomic-classifier-tests-in-prostate-cancer-risk-stratification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0bd0249-898a-45de-a6da-6da9fdb96a2c Mon, 20 Jan 2025 19:34:02 -0500 Exploring the use of genomic classifier tests in prostate cancer risk stratification
研究揭示中国女性性功能障碍的发生率和危险因素女性性功能障碍（FSD）是一种影响女性性唤起、性欲、性高潮或疼痛的疾病，已被认为是中国的隐性流行病，农村地区的发病率高于城市。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Study-sheds-light-on-the-incidence-and-risk-factors-of-female-male-dysfunction-in-Chinese-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Study-sheds-light-on-the-incidence-and-risk-factors-of-female-male-dysfunction-in-Chinese-women.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60ff7ca6-e2cc-4222-8266-f77d66468c21 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 19:29:00 -0500 Study sheds light on the incidence and risk factors of female sexual dysfunction in Chinese women
共生和水平基因转移塑造叶甲虫的进化叶甲科有超过 50,000 种已描述的物种，分布于世界各地，约占所有食草动物物种多样性的四分之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Symbiosis-and-horizo​​ntal-gene-transfer-shape-leaf-beetle-evolution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Symbiosis-and-horizo​​ntal-gene-transfer-shape-leaf-beetle-evolution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba750d09-d051-4aa1-8453-32399febad8b Mon, 20 Jan 2025 19:25:26 -0500 Symbiosis and horizontal gene transfer shape leaf beetle evolution
肠道微生物和植物性食品：健康老龄化的强大组合肠道微生物群和植物化学物质协同产生生物活性代谢物，通过支持肠道和全身健康来对抗衰老、减少炎症并延长健康寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Gut-microbes-and-plant-foods-a-powerful-duo-for-healthy-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Gut-microbes-and-plant-foods-a-powerful-duo-for-healthy-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50831c4c-01ee-4f44-b25a-b776aeb0f427 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 19:20:00 -0500 Gut microbes and plant foods: a powerful duo for healthy aging
与肥胖指标相关的 TyG 指数可以预测美国成年人的高血压风险一项研究发现，甘油三酯-葡萄糖 (TyG) 指数与肥胖指标相结合，与美国成年人的高血压风险显着相关，为改善心血管风险评估提供了潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/TyG-index-linked-to-obesity-measures-can-predict-hypertension-risk-in-US-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/TyG-index-linked-to-obesity-measures-can-predict-hypertension-risk-in-US-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b0793de-7598-4b3f-b4d3-3eac68f0734a Mon, 20 Jan 2025 18:47:00 -0500 TyG index linked to obesity measures can predict hypertension risk in US adults
